item.description:
Brief Description
Join us at Blue Back Square in West Hartford for this special holiday 5K to benefit our neighbors in need. The 5K course winds through the wide avenues of West Hartford Center, past festive shop windows and neighborhoods decorated for the season. Start, finish and post race refreshments in Blue Back Square.

Additional Information
The Blue Back Mitten Run will warm your heart and help your neighbor. We will be collecting donations of new mittens, gloves, hats or scarves for those in need. Please bring your donations to the race and drop in designated boxes at packet pickup. No limit on numbers of items, so please donate generously.

Start Time: 10:30 AM

Registration Closing Date
Tuesday, November 29, 2011 @ 8:00 AM PST

Category Price Now 5K - Adult $25.00 5K - Student ages 22 and under $20.00 Kids Fun Run (11 & under) $10.00
item.name: 5K: Blue Back Mitten Run
